name: Flying Bubble - Ball Pop
description:
Flying Bubble - Ball Pop is a fun puzzle game featuring some cool original graphics, colorful pool balls and hundreds of awesome levels filled with adventure and challenge.
Features:
- Challenge over 500 interesting levels
- Aim and tap screen to shoot bubbles
- Awesome animations and effect
- Amazing combos and bonus time
- Delicate bubbles and lovely fishes
- Easy to play but hard to be master
